summary: This document appears to be a quarterly staff roster or assignment log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 2019. It lists shift assignments, sick leave, and overtime details for personnel, likely during the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there before his death.

events.title: MCC Staff Roster Creation
events.description: A quarterly roster of staff assignments, sick leave, and overtime at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York was generated.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff roster/assignment log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 2019.
The document shows shift assignments, sick leave, and overtime details for MCC personnel during the third quarter of 2019.
The timing (August 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at MCC prior to his death on August 10, 2019.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text, only shift codes and dates.
The document appears to be an internal administrative record for prison staff scheduling.
